edu.xtec.jclic.shapers

Interface EditableShape

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Shape
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditableCubicCurve2D, EditableEllipse2D, EditableLine2D, EditableQuadCurve2D, EditableRectangle

    public interface EditableShape
extends Shape
    This interface defines a Shape that implements specific methods to be modified (edited) in a graphic environment
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    allastar

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void aproximateNearestBorder(double x, double y)
      Moves towards a specific point the side of the shape that is located nearest it. .
      void changeBorder(double x, double y)
      Changes the co-ordinates of the previously marked corner to (x, y)
      Object clone()
      Makes a copy of the shape.
      void deselectBorder()
      Unselects the selected border of the shape, if any.
      double distanceTo(double x, double y)
      Computes the distance between a supplied point and the nearest limit of the shape.
      EditableShape[] divide(double x, double y)
      Divides the shape taking (x,y) as the "significant" point of the division.

      Draws the shape with dragable sides
      Point2D[] getBorders()
      Gets an array with all the corners and other special points of the shape.
      Point2D getEndPoint()
      Gets the point of the shape that is considered as "ending" point.

      Rerturns the starting point of the side of the shape nearest to a specific point.

      Checks if the specified point lies within a side of the shape

      Checks if the shape currently has a selected side.

      Applies an affine transformation (rotation, trnaslation, scale...) to the shape

    • Method Detail

      • setSelected

        void setSelected(boolean b)
        Selects/unselects the shape
        Parameters:
        b - The state (selected/unselected) of the shape

      • isSelected

        boolean isSelected()
        Checks if the shape is selected
        Returns:
        true if the shape is selected, false otherwise.

      • paint

        void paint(Graphics g,
           int drawingMode)
        Draws the shape with the default colour
        Parameters:
        g - The graphic environment where to draw the shape
        drawingMode - The drawing mode. Squares are drawed in red when this value is ShapeGenPanel.NEW_POINT

      • paintWithColor

        void paintWithColor(Graphics g,
                    int drawingMode,
                    Color c)
        Draws the shape with the indicated color.
        Parameters:
        g - The graphic environment where to draw the shape
        drawingMode - The drawing mode. Squares are drawed in red when this value is ShapeGenPanel.NEW_POINT
        c - The color to be used to draw the shape

      • paintSelection

        void paintSelection(Graphics g)
        Draws squares in black and the remainder objects in the selection color (EditableShapeConstants.selectedColor)
        Parameters:
        g - The graphic environment where to draw the shape

      • drawBorders

        void drawBorders(Graphics g)
        Draws the shape with dragable sides
        Parameters:
        g - The graphic environment where to draw the shape

      • hasClickedBorder

        boolean hasClickedBorder(double x,
                         double y,
                         boolean needSelected)
        Checks if the specified point lies within a side of the shape
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal co-ordinate of the point to check
        y - The vertical co-ordinate of the point to check
        needSelected - When the value of this param is true, the side must be selected.
        Returns:
        Returns true when a side of the shape is near the point defined by x and y.

      • selectBorder

        void selectBorder(double x,
                  double y)
        Selects the side of the shape that lies with the specified point (if any).
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal co-ordinate of the point to check
        y - The vertical co-ordinate of the point to check

      • getNearestBorder

        Point2D getNearestBorder(double x,
                         double y)
        Rerturns the starting point of the side of the shape nearest to a specific point.
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal co-ordinate of the point
        y - The vertical co-ordinate of the point
        Returns:
        The starting point of the side nearest to the point

      • aproximateNearestBorder

        void aproximateNearestBorder(double x,
                             double y)
        Moves towards a specific point the side of the shape that is located nearest it. .
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal co-ordinate of the point
        y - The vertival co-ordinate of the point

      • distanceTo

        double distanceTo(double x,
                  double y)
        Computes the distance between a supplied point and the nearest limit of the shape.
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal co-ordinate of the point
        y - The vertical co-ordinate of the point
        Returns:
        The distance between the point and the shape

      • isInto

        boolean isInto(Rectangle2D r)
        Checks if the shape is into the limits of a specific Rectangle.
        Parameters:
        r - The rectangle to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the shape intersects with the rectangle, false otherwise.

      • changeBorder

        void changeBorder(double x,
                  double y)
        Changes the co-ordinates of the previously marked corner to (x, y)
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal co-ordinate of the point
        y - The vertical co-ordinate of the point

      • deselectBorder

        void deselectBorder()
        Unselects the selected border of the shape, if any.

      • getNotSelectedBorder

        Point2D getNotSelectedBorder()
        Gets the starting point of the first non-selected side of the shape
        Returns:
        The starting point of the side

      • hasSelectedBorder

        boolean hasSelectedBorder()
        Checks if the shape currently has a selected side.
        Returns:
        true if the shape has a selected side, false otherwise.

      • transform

        void transform(AffineTransform aTransf)
        Applies an affine transformation (rotation, trnaslation, scale...) to the shape
        Parameters:
        aTransf - The affine transformation to be applied

      • divide

        EditableShape[] divide(double x,
                       double y)
        Divides the shape taking (x,y) as the "significant" point of the division.
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal co-ordinate of the point
        y - The vertical co-ordinate of the point
        Returns:
        An array with the two shapes resulting of the division.

      • isAdjacentTo

        boolean isAdjacentTo(Point2D p)
        Checks if the shape is adjacent to a specific point.
        Parameters:
        p - The point to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the shape is adjacent to the point, false otherwise

      • getInitialPoint

        Point2D getInitialPoint()
        Returns the point of the shape that acts as "starting" point. It is needed to establish the path that draws the shape.
        Returns:
        The starting point of the shape

      • getEndPoint

        Point2D getEndPoint()
        Gets the point of the shape that is considered as "ending" point.
        Returns:
        The ending point of the shape.

      • getBorders

        Point2D[] getBorders()
        Gets an array with all the corners and other special points of the shape.
        Returns:
        The array of the points used to build the path that draws the shape.

      • clone

        Object clone()
        Makes a copy of the shape.
        Returns:
        The copy of the object
